name: Amnesia 3D
description:
Experience a horrific journey through deadly maze of abandoned facilities and try to escape from the dead. You woke up in strange, dark underground chambers and you don't remember anything. You have one job, get out as soon as possible. Collect the runes and keys to unlock the doors, let's see how for you can get!

- stunning 3D graphics
- immersive first person gameplay
- real horror vibe
- smooth and easy controls
- huge and challenging levels

Get ready for the most intense experience you've ever had.
